hadiths.text: Abu Salama b. 'Abd al-Rahman reported on the authority ot 'A'isha that when Sa'd b. Abu Waqqas died she said:Bring it (the bier) into the mosque so that I offer prayer for him. But, this act of hers was disapproved. She said: By Allah, the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) offered prayer in the mosque for the two sons of Baida', viz, for Suhail and his brother

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الْجَنَازَةِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: Offering the funeral prayer in the masjid
